Container.Name: AutoGPT-Platform
Container.Overview:
AutoGPT Platform is a powerful system for creating, deploying, and managing continuous AI agents that automate complex workflows. This template sets up the complete platform including frontend, backend services, database, and message queue.
This is a complete stack deployment that includes: - Frontend web interface - Backend API services - PostgreSQL database with pgvector - Redis for caching - RabbitMQ for task queuing - Supabase for authentication
IMPORTANT: This template creates multiple containers. Make sure you have sufficient resources (minimum 8GB RAM, 4 CPU cores) and available disk space (minimum 20GB).
Container.DonateText: AutoGPT is an open-source project. Consider supporting development.
Container.Requires: This template requires the AutoGPT Platform stack to be deployed. Please follow the setup instructions at: https://docs.agpt.co/platform/deployment/unraid/

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for the AutoGPT Platform web interface

Config.Name: Backend API URL
Config.Description: URL for the backend API server. Replace [IP] with your Unraid server IP.

Config.Name: Supabase URL
Config.Description: URL for Supabase authentication. Replace [IP] with your Unraid server IP.

Config.Name: WebSocket URL
Config.Description: WebSocket URL for real-time communication. Replace [IP] with your Unraid server IP.
